Name: Can we have a second helping? A replication study on the neurobiological mechanisms underlying self-control
Acknowledgements: We would like to acknowledge the generous support from the National Sciences Foundation (NWO) through the Pilot Replication program (# 401.16.023). Further, we would like to acknowledge Nadine van der Waal and Timo Matzen who helped with the data acquisition.
HowToAcknowledge: When using data, please cite the following: 'This data was obtained from the OpenNeuro database.' Please also cite the following references: Scholz et al. (in prep) -- see full reference below.
Funding: This work is part of the research programme Pilot Replication with project number 401.16.023, which is (partly) financed by the Dutch Research Council (NWO)
ReferencesAndLinks: Please cite the following papers when using this data: Scholz, C., Chan, H.Y., Poldrack, R.A., De Ridder, D.T.D., Smidts, A., Van der Laan, L.N. (in preparation) Can we have a second helping? A replication study on the neurobiological mechanisms underlying self-control. Preregistration file of the study: https://osf.io/qnpjm
